doc:
Helena Blackman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helena_Blackman 0 Helena Blackman (born 10 December 1982 in Southampton) is a British musical theatre actress best known for being the runner-up in the hit BBC1 Reality TV programme How Do You Solve A Problem Like Maria?. She trained at the Guildford School of Acting. Helena_Blackman ( born_10_December_1982 in Southampton ) is a_British_musical_theatre_actress best known for being the_runner-up in the_hit_BBC1_Reality_TV_programme How Do You Solve A_Problem Like Maria ? . She trained at the_Guildford_School of Acting .
